title: Ticket #3308: Change references to condor to htcondor in installer
description: Need to go through installer for both 7.8 and master to change references to Condor to HTCondor, make sure the new text still aligns nicely, etc. Also need to change the graphics on the left panel.
remarks:
2012-Nov-07 16:28:13 by ziliang:
Right now graphics need to be redone and the product name that is inserted by cmake needs to be changed. Otherwise, I think I got all of the references in the actual WiX files.

2012-Nov-28 13:24:32 by tstclair:
Your image has not been updated on 7_8 branch.?.? Was this on purpose?
